# formatterBehavior

**Instance Property**

The formatter behavior for the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var formatterBehavior: DateFormatter.Behavior { get set }
```

## Managing Behavior Version

- **defaultFormatterBehavior**: Returns the default formatting behavior for instances of the class.
